timeline.message:
ExpireSnapshots executeWith renamed executeDeleteWith

The executor passed in executeWith is only used for deletes so we will rename it
to executeDeleteWith. The JavaDoc already states it will only effect deletes and
the implementation already match this name so no other changes are needed.

timeline.bodyText: Can we add the new name in parallel and deprecate this name? We should be careful about changes to the public API and give people at least a release to switch over before removing public methods.
timeline.author: rdblue
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -96,7 +96,7 @@
    * @param executorService an executor service to parallelize tasks to delete manifests and data files
    * @return this for method chaining
    */
-  ExpireSnapshots executeWith(ExecutorService executorService);

replies.bodyText: Ah I didn't think we hit a release boundary since that addition, sure no problem
replies.author: RussellSpitzer

replies.bodyText: It seems we did not release it yet.
replies.author: aokolnychyi

replies.bodyText:
You're right! It is only in master and not 0.9.0: ceb6533
Nevermind, it should be fine to rename.
replies.author: rdblue
